thread.title: March holidays in Paris=)
thread.title_full: March holidays in Paris=) - Review of Hotel Oasis Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: thaitouristukr
title: March holidays in Paris=)
text:
We enjoyed too much stying in the hotel.Its located in cozy safe place,few metres to metro,nearest access to market,laundry,restaurants and shops.
The room is not big but enough to feell comfortably,everything is clean.
Some problem with wif-fi,but its problem everywhere in Paris(It doesnt hurts cause we came here not for wi-fi);
Its great place to feel paris mood and feel yourself safety and comfortable=))))
Hope to back here again=)))
Room Tip: we had 24,and we like it too much=)) See more room tips
